text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Kris S, are you having trouble with anything? 
I know you've gotten used to things around 
here, but there might still be some cultural 
differences that bother you.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
—— If I had to say…… 
The milk containers here… are too small.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Aah, makes sense. People bulk-buy whole 
gallons of milk in your country, right? 
That really is a difference in culture.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
I use it in protein shakes… and cereal. 
So shopping for milk is… inefficient.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hmm…… let's try discussing it with the 
school store. Perhaps we can get them 
to sell milk in gallon jugs.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Without any preparations? 
They're just gonna kick the 
can down the road.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
That is certainly something to consider. 
We could use concrete data that proves 
that large milk jugs are needed, but ——

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
A month's worth… of milk consumption data. 
Large milk jugs' uses and… advantages. 
I will… prepare what's necessary.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Will you? That'd be a great help, Kris S. 
We should also investigate if there are 
other requests from the foreign students.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
If the great student council president asked 
them personally, they might feel pressured. 
You won't get accurate data like that.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
I could lend you a hand, if you want? 
We got a lot of foreign students in our group. 
I'm doing you a favor here, so be grateful.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Heheh. Now we have a solid foundation. 
…Very well, I should start preparing 
for the necessary negotiations as well. 
Sirius, Kris S — Let's achieve this together.
